Name: Hummingbird
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
30 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
30 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with 12oz scoop crushed ice and serve with straws.
Review: With flavours of rum, coconut, banana and coffee, this tall, frozen drink tastes rather like dessert.
History: The house cocktail at the Hummingbird Beach Resort, Soufriere, St. Lucia.
